Senior Software Engineer - Backend
TechGiant Corp | San Francisco, CA | Full-time

About the Role:
We're looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join our Platform team. You'll be building scalable backend systems that power our next-generation products.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement microservices using Python and Go
- Build and maintain RESTful and GraphQL APIs
- Work with databases (PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB)
- Collaborate with frontend teams and product managers
- Participate in on-call rotation
- Mentor junior engineers

Requirements:

Must Have:
- 5+ years of software engineering experience
- Strong proficiency in Python
- Experience with microservices architecture
- Knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases
- Experience with AWS or similar cloud platforms
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent

Nice to Have:
- Experience with Go programming language
- Knowledge of Kubernetes and Docker
- GraphQL experience
- Experience with CI/CD pipelines
- Contributions to open source projects

Benefits:
- Competitive salary: $180,000 - $220,000
- Equity package
- Health, dental, and vision insurance
- 401(k) matching
- Flexible work arrangements
- Learning and development budget

Our Culture:
We value collaboration, innovation, and work-life balance. Our team is diverse and inclusive, and we're committed to building products that make a difference.

To Apply:
Submit your resume and cover letter. We review all applications and respond within 2 weeks.
